name: emi.unicore-uvos
description: UNICORE VO Service (UVOS) is a client-server system, developed to be used as an additional tool for large distributed systems, providing a solution for grid users management. Grid systems, especially UNICORE grid middleware, are the mainspring of the UVOS system. UVOS can be used with different systems, however is designed primarily to support UNICORE grid middleware.
releaseNotes:
What's new for UVOS server:

    * UVOS server was updated to use latest persistence libraries (JDBC drivers, MyBatis 3).

    * Support for MySQL database backend was added.

    * Support for attribute filtering on SAML interface is available.

    * Documentation was updated.

 

Installation and configuration:

    * There are no special issues regarding the fresh installation.

    * The standard yum update procedure can be taken, i.e. administrator should check if there are any .rpmnew or .rpmsave files after performing the update and merge changes according to the latest documentation. In this release such situation can happen in case of one file: uvosServer.conf.



 

Know issues:

NONE
